title: How To Remove a Deployment in Kubernetes: Methods, Steps and Tools
author: Sunny Yadav
description: Tired of orphaned pods and volumes? Learn how to remove a Deployment in Kubernetes in five easy steps and keep your cluster lean and ready for the next Deployment.
cntitle: 如何在 Kubernetes 中删除 Deployment：方法、步骤和工具
cndescription: 厌倦了孤立的 Pod 和卷？ 了解如何在 Kubernetes 中通过五个简单的步骤删除 Deployment，并保持集群精简，为下一个 Deployment 做好准备。
